title: Earring
description: Gold earring – Loop a gold wire the ends twisted round one another. Pendant. Attached by broad ribbed loop with beaded borders, a flat circular disc of gold decorated with granulation and 3 red stones in circular setting (1 lost). From lower edge hang 3 chains of S-shaped links, ending in glass beads, iridescent. Gold has reddish tinge.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
